ygData.subject: Re: Loosing exp when dying
ygData.msgSnippet: RE: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dyingyou start losing exp at level 6 the amount you lose increases each level ... From: Whitmore, Lance To:
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dyingyou start losing exp at level 6
the amount you lose increases each level
----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:19 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


This is just a guess but i think its your level that is used to calculate. It seems that the higher you are the more experience you lose. You dont lose any until you reach lvl 5, after that it seems to increase with each lvl.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:13 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying



From: scott@...

I saw someone write somewhere that the exp you loose depends on the monster that kills you. Such as if you die from a monster that is many levels below you, you loose more exp. Is this true?

Azboklin the enchanter
